rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/kill" rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/hostname" rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/uptime"
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/sbin" mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/chroot" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/sbin/chroot"
# we need join to make gnulib work, so put it in a separate package install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/join/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" mv "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/join" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/join/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/join"
